attributes.action: Make it optional for Primary and Secondary students to go to school on Monday
attributes.background: So that you are not forced for primary and secondary schools to go to school on Monday. So Mondays in secondary and primary schools will be allowed absences

rejection.details:
We think that the below petition is very similar to the issue you have raised.

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
